unnormalised: Just saw Mr. Sharma, the SDM, resolve a land dispute in our village; heard he was previously BDO in a neighboring district. He seems quite effective, unlike the previous Tehsildar.
normalised: Just saw Mister Sharma, the S-D-M, resolve a land dispute in our village; heard he was previously B-D-O in a neighboring district. He seems quite effective, unlike the previous Tehsildar.
